name: ChristEpiscopalSchool
0:
”Alexa, ask Christ Episcopal School for the latest news”
”Text that to me”
”Upcoming events”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: christ episcopal school
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Stay up to date on the latest news from Christ Episcopal School. With this skill you can...

* Hear the latest Christ Episcopal School Facebook posts
* Hear a description of upcoming events
* Have any post texted to your phone. If you hear a post you are interested in, just say "text that to me" and a link to the post will be texted to your phone. If this is the first time you've used this feature, the skill will ask you to speak your cell phone number so it knows where to send the text.

A great way to keep informed using just your voice.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
